youtube.title: Bacteriophage Lytic Cycle Explained: How Viruses Infect Bacteria
youtube.description: Explore the fascinating world of microbiology with this visualization of the Lytic Cycle. Watch how a bacteriophage attaches to, infects, and eventually destroys a bacterial cell to replicate. Perfect for biology students and science enthusiasts!
